addr: 72 Allen Street. FLR 3. New York, NY 10002
title: New York 3D Printing for Designers & Architects
desc: Join us for an evening tailored to designers, architects and techies using or who would like to use 3D printing in their work. Set in the beautiful   LES loft we're bringing together industry leaders to explore High Definition material in 3D Printing. We are curating an outstanding lineup of speakers from the industry who will talk about their use of 3D Printing in their work. This is your opportunity to learn about Strong & Flexible material, how to design for it and see cutting edge applications of this technology. But we don't want to leave you with a merely theorectical experience. Along with your ticket you will receive 30% discount on a High Definition print from 3D Hubs HD, so you can see, feel and experience the showcased technology yourself. 6:30: ?Check-in 7:00: ?Nikki Finnemore| 3D Hubs 7:30: Francis Bitonti - Francis Bitonti Studio 8:00: Brad Rothenberg - nTopology 8:30: SLS Technical Expert 9:00: Chat, drinks and snacks ? ? ? Please do contact me should you have any questions. I hope you'll be able to join us! Nikki Media parters for the event:
